_meanings:
{@--3@} (In
<ab>Rhet.</ab>) Powerless to convey the 
intended meaning, a defect of a word; 

{#yattadarTaM paWyate na ca tatrAsya SAktiH tadasamarTatvaM#}
<ls>K. P. 7</ls>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} in {#kuMjaM haMti kfSodarI, han#},
though read in root-books in
the sense of ‘going’, is here 
powerless to convey that meaning.

a compound in which the
conjunction of words is not as it
should be; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} in {#aSrAdDaBojin#}, 
{#asUryaMpaSya, a#} goes not with {#SrAdDa#} or {#sUrya#}
but with {#Bojin#} or {#paSya#}.
